roleset.name: be prosperous
roleset.note: PROSPER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prosper' based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'prospering' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls exist-47.1-1, gorge-39.6. (from prosper.01-v)
PROSPEROUS-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from prosperous.01-j)
PROSPERING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from prospering.01-n)

example.name: live long and...
example.text: Prospective bond buyers noted that TW historically has prospered because it has been willing to spend aggressively on remodeling restaurants and redoing menus.
example.arg: because it has been willing to spend aggressively on remodeling restaurants and redoing menus

example.name: nominal rel: prospering
example.text: The prospering of a nation 's culture , is also important indication of whether this nation can stand among the forest of nations .
